name: R.O.B.O.C.T.O.
description:
R.O.B.O.C.T.O. (Robotic. Octopus. Baits. Out. Certain. Tech. Objects.)

A simple game idea, where you play as a robotic tentacle, traveling up from the sea floor with the goal of dragging as many resources as you can to extend you length.

Avoid barrels while ascending and grab as many as possible when descending.
